MAN.TITLE: ode_discrete
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: ordinary differential equation solver, discrete time simulation

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : external i.e. function or character string or list.

DESCRIPTION.P: With this syntax (first argument equal to "discrete") ode computes recursively y(k+1)=f(k,y(k)) from an initial state y(k0) and returns y(k) for k in kvect. kvect(1) must be greater than or equal to k0.
Other arguments and other options are the same as for ode, see the ode help.
